message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your needs perfectly. Given its value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $100 to you. Considering the exceptional benefits it provides, I am extending this exclusive offer at a price of $125. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a slightly elevated cost, reflecting its true worth and the benefits it will bring to you. I look forward to your positive response.
